reviews.text: Prosail Whitsundays (owner)a week agoThank you so much for sailing with us on Hammer and for sharing such a lovely review! We’re stoked to hear you had an amazing time out on the water. Maggie will be so happy to know her care (and her curry!) made an impression, and Thomas and Dries will love hearing your kind words too.It sounds like you made the most of the adventure, and we’re grateful you chose to experience the Whitsundays with Prosail. Thanks again for the recommendation — we’d love to welcome you back on board anytime! :)
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: What an amazing experience! Loved the crew, only good vibes. We had the most beautiful views while sailing through the Whitsundays. Skipper Thomas ensured smooth sailings and all other aspects as food and safety. Thanks crew ❤️
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Prosail Whitsundays (owner)4 days agoEpic to hear you had such an amazing time! Only good vibes is exactly what we aim for, so we’re stoked the crew and skipper Thomas delivered an unreal experience for you — smooth sailing, stunning views and all the little details taken care of. Thanks so much for sailing with us! :)

We’re so happy to hear your time on Condor with Ben, Diego and Miyabi was so great!! They will love knowing their knowledge, energy and thoughtful planning helped make the experience so special for you! Thanks very much for the glowing recommendation, we'd have you back sailing with us anytime!!

reviews.text: Prosail Whitsundays (owner)3 months agoWhat a beautiful reflection – thank you so much! :)We absolutely love to hear your time on Condor was filled with joy, connection, and unforgettable moments. Mathias, Bam, and Dan will be so happy to know they helped make your Whitsundays experience so special. From sunsets to snorkelling to surprise whale sightings – it sounds like you really soaked in the magic of the Whitsundays. Thanks for sailing with us :)

reviews.text: Prosail Whitsundays (owner)a month agoThank you so much for sharing this wonderful feedback! We’re stoked you had such a fantastic time on Broomstick with Ben, Ian, Sam, and Dries. Sounds like you experienced it all — stunning sunrises and sunsets, lively sailing, incredible snorkelling, and even multiple whale sightings (how GOOD is whale season!!). We’ll be sure to pass on your kind words to the crew, they’ll be stoked to hear it. We’d love to have you back onboard for another adventure someday :)
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Thank you so much for sharing this wonderful feedback! We’re stoked you had such a fantastic time on Broomstick with Ben, Ian, Sam, and Dries. reviews.text: The most incredible experience! The Whitsundays were stunning, the people great and the crew exceptional. Had the best few days and one of my favourite experiences in Australia so far! Thank you so much and big shout out to Romain, Ryan and Sam you were amazing!
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Prosail Whitsundays (owner)a month agoThanks so much for your lovely review! We’re thrilled to hear your trip was one of your favourite experiences in Australia - what a compliment! :)The Whitsundays really are stunning, and we’re glad Romain, Ryan, and Sam helped make it such a memorable few days for you.We hope the rest of your travels are just as epic!!
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Thanks so much for your lovely review! reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: I really enjoyed the 2 day Whitsundays islands tour with Prosail. The crew were very professional and fun and created a fantastic atmosphere on board. The food on board was great, and we were brought to all the good spots in the island to visit beaches and to snorkel in the reef. Would highly recommend this trip.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: 2D2N spent on the Condor boat with captain Dan and crew Matthias and BAM (Bella). Was the most amazing trip sailing around the Whitsundays. Food was AMAZING cooked by the crew and good chat from everyone. Anchor and snorkelling locations were unbelievable will definitely be using pro sail if I sail the Whitsundays again!
reviews.author: Customer
